thread.title: Khloe Kardashian Cuts Her Hair, Promotes Her Book While Caring for Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian Cuts Her Hair, Promotes Her Book While Caring for Lamar Odom

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Khloe Kardashian Cuts Her Hair, Promotes Her Book While Caring for Lamar Odom
text:
Comments While Khloe is taking care of Lamar, she changes her hairstyle and promotes her upcoming book 'Strong Looks Better Naked' by posting a video on Twitter. 
Khloe Kardashian changes her look while she's taking care of Lamar Odom . The " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star opts for medium-length hairstyle for her new hairdo. Celebrity hairstylist Jen Atkin took to Instagram on Sunday, October 25 to share a picture of the reality TV star flaunting her new haircut. Khloe pouted to the camera while her hair was parted sideway covering half of her face. A caption for the picture read, "Guess who just joined the #ShortHairDontCare club! Do we like?" Foto kiriman Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 2:01 PDT On the same day, the 31-year-old reality TV star attended Kim Kardashian 's baby shower . During the occasion, Khloe sported her new do. Based on the pictures posted by sisters Kylie Jenner and Kendall Jenner on their respective Instagram accounts, Khloe appeared to be enjoying her time surrounded by her sisters. On the previous day, Khloe posted on Twitter a promotional video for her upcoming book "Strong Looks Better Naked". The video showed behind the scenes of some shots for her book. The said video featured some photo shoots when Khloe wore black sports bra and long-sleeved turtleneck shirt. "My book is coming out so soon! Here's a little BTS vid...Enjoy my loves!" she excitedly captioned the video. My book is coming out so soon! Here���ï¿½ ¢ ¯ ¿ ½ ¯ ¿ ½s a little BTS vid...Enjoy my loves! https://t.co/4JWmdy7q43 pic.twitter.com/QjlDOj5zWp — Khlo���ï¿½��¯��¿��½���ï¿½ © (@khloekardashian) 24 Oktober 2015 While Khloe posted the video to promote her book, the reality TV star reportedly canceled her book press tour. The " Kocktails with Khloe " host made the decision because she wanted to remain by Lamar's side. She wanted to take care of him until he's fully recovered.
